meanings.sent1: The cellulosic fibers in the plant provide strength and structure.
meanings.sent2: The paper was made from a cellulosic material that was easy to recycle.
meanings.sent3: The cellulosic leaves rustled in the wind, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as delicate and intricate as a cellulosic web spun by a spider.
meanings.sent5: The cellulosic nature of the tree trunk made it resistant to decay.

meanings.sent1: The cellulosic walls of the plant cells provide support and protection.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was soft and breathable due to its cellulosic composition.
meanings.sent3: The cellulosic fibers intertwined to create a strong and durable material.
meanings.sent4: The cellulosic structure of the tree resembled a fortress, standing tall and sturdy.
meanings.sent5: The cellulosic content of the food made it a healthy choice for digestion.

meanings.definition: A material made from cellulose fibers.
meanings.sent1: The designer used a cellulosic fabric to create a sustainable fashion line.
meanings.sent2: The company developed a new cellulosic product to reduce environmental impact.
meanings.sent3: The cellulosic used in the construction industry proved to be both durable and eco-friendly.
meanings.sent4: The cellulosic was processed into a versatile material for various applications.
meanings.sent5: The cellulosic was a popular choice among manufacturers for its renewable properties.
